attributes.action: To release the 1921, now or in a few years, rather than 100 years,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If people want to know their family history they can look back at census right through most of the nineteenth century however, 1911 which is new itself is as far as we can go in the 20th.    

Opening the 1912 census would help a great deal not just for geneologists but for people who know nothing about their parents or grandparents.    

Just because of the law set out in 1922 they have to wait 100 years but why as its almost 90 years ago why not release it now.
